awards:
第74届美国导演工会奖(2022)
　　最佳儿童电视节目导演 斯里蒂·穆德拉

director.name: 斯里蒂·穆德拉 Smriti Mundhra

introduction: Through Our Eyes is an intimate and inspiring journey into the lives of American families, from the perspective of children themselves as they navigate formidable yet all-too-common challenges along with parents and siblings. The four-part docu-series captures the innocence of childhood and the strength of perseverance in the face of parental incarceration, climate displacement, the wounds of war, and homelessness.
